title: Populist Party on role of government - cause

content.question: Activists formed the Populist Party most directly in response to the

choices.label: growth of corporate power in agriculture and economic instability in farming
emergence of concerns about abuses of the environment
development of reform movements inspired by the Second Great Awakening
rise of monopolies and reduction of wages for industrial workers

content.answer: growth of corporate power in agriculture and economic instability in farming

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
